description: '''Exhumed''' is an American [[deathgrind]] band  formed in [[San Jose, California]], that is currently signed to [[Relapse Records]]. It is centered around vocalist-guitarist Matt Harvey, who is the leading force of the group, as well as the sole constant member. The band has released nine albums and eight split 7-inch singles. They were formed in 1990, went on hiatus in 2005, and reformed in 2010.
